control.name: checkBox1
control.description: A summary is a brief bit of information about particular columns (the number of nodes, the maximum value, etc.). Summaries are displayed within the tree list's footer or parent node (group). If the "Enable Footer Menu" check box is checked, end-users can click the summary footer and group footers to invoke their context menus. The customization of the footer and group summaries is implemented in the InitSummaries() method.
